TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParameterCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection

summary.span: 表示数据源控件在高级数据绑定方案中使用的 和 派生对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of and -derived objects that are used by data source controls in advanced data-binding scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一系列在数据源控件使用的高级数据绑定方案中使用的对象。The class represents a collection of objects used in advanced data-binding scenarios with data source controls. 对象用于绑定的值所包含的本地变量、 HTTP cookie、 会话变量和其他控件的值与数据源控件时检索、 更新、 删除和插入数据。The objects are used to bind the values contained by local variables, HTTP cookies, session variables, and other controls' values to data source controls when retrieving, updating, deleting, and inserting data. 使用类以编程方式管理的一组对象。Use the class to programmatically manage a set of objects. 可以添加、 插入和移除对象使用的相应方法类。You can add, insert, and remove objects using the appropriate methods of the class. 若要以编程方式检索对象从一个集合，使用以下方法之一：To programmatically retrieve objects from a collection, use one of following methods: - 使用索引器获取单个从集合中，按名称或使用数组表示法的对象。Use the indexer to get a single object from the collection, by name or using array notation. - 使用方法来创建-实现的对象，然后可用于从集合中获取项。Use the method to create a -implemented object, which can then be used to get items from the collection. 属性集合中指定的项总数以及用于确定集合中的上限。The property specifies the total number of items in the collection, and is used to determine the upper bound of the collection. 可以添加和从集合中移除项，通过使用， ， ，和方法。You can add and remove items from the collection by using the , , , and methods. 具体取决于实现和特定的数据源控件，这些参数存储在中的顺序的语义集合可能会很重要。Depending on the implementation and the semantics of a particular data source control, the order in which the parameters are stored in the collection might be important. 例如，在使用控件作为 ODBC 数据源的顺序中的对象集合必须与您使用参数化 SQL 查询中参数的顺序相同。For example, when using the control as an ODBC data source, the order of the objects in the collection must be the same as the order of the parameters in the parameterized SQL queries you use. 但是，使用时使用 Microsoft SQL Server 的顺序控制对象并不重要。However, when using the control with Microsoft SQL Server, the order of the objects are not important. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当您使用数据源控件时，则将值插入到命令参数而不进行验证，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。When you use data source controls, values are inserted into command parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用事件数据源控件中执行该命令之前验证参数值。Use an event in the data source control to validate parameter values before the command is executed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 下表列出了不同的参数类以及如何使用它们。The following table lists the different parameter classes and how they are used. |参数类Parameter Class|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||基参数类。The base parameter class. 使用它来将绑定到本地变量或任何静态字符串使用属性。Use it to bind to a local variable or any static string using the property.| ||可用于绑定到控件的属性或方法的参数返回的值。A parameter that can be used to bind to a control's property or method return value.| ||一个参数，可用于绑定到的 cookie 的值。A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of a cookie.| ||一个参数，可用于绑定到当前 Web 窗体页的属性。A parameter that can be used to bind to an attribute of the current Web Forms page.| ||一个参数，可用于绑定到查询字符串上传递到 Web 窗体页的值。A parameter that can be used to bind to a value passed to a Web Forms page on a query string.| ||一个参数，可用于绑定到会话变量的值。A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of a session variable.| ||一个参数，可用于绑定到 ASP.NET 配置文件属性的值。A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of an ASP.NET Profile property.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件和一个以显示从 Microsoft Access 数据库中的信息控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control and a to display information from a Microsoft Access database in a control. 对象添加到集合使用方法。The object is added to the collection using the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2/CS/fp2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2/VB/fp2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的 对象追加到集合末尾。

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.
The index value of the added item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以追加到集合末尾的对象。Use the method to append a object to the end of the collection. 此实现该方法采用由指定的对象`param`参数并将其追加到集合。This implementation of the method takes the object specified by the `param` parameter and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件和一个对象显示从 Microsoft Access 数据库中的信息控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control and a object to display information from a Microsoft Access database in a control. 对象添加到集合使用方法。The object is added to the collection using the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2/CS/fp2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_2/VB/fp2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 用指定的名称和默认值创建 对象，并将它追加到集合末尾。

span.span: Creates a object with the specified name and default value, and appends it to the end of the collection.
The index value of the added item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法创建并追加，默认值为集合的末尾的对象。Use the method to create and append a object with a default value to the end of the collection. 该方法的此实现创建对象使用指定的名称和默认值`name`和`value`参数分别，并将其追加到集合。This implementation of the method creates the object using the name and default value specified by the `name` and `value` parameters, respectively, and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何方法可用于添加新对象添加到通过提供集合`name`和`value`参数。The following code example demonstrates how the method can be used to add new objects to a collection by supplying the `name` and `value` parameters. 在此示例中，对象添加到绑定到的值的访问数据源控件的更新命令控件。In this example, a object is added to an Update command of an Access data source control that is bound to the value of a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2/CS/paramcoll2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection_2/VB/paramcoll2vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法创建并追加一个强类型化，默认值为集合的末尾的对象。Use the method to create and append a strongly typed object with a default value to the end of the collection. 该方法的此实现创建对象使用名称、 类型和指定值`name`，`type`和`value`参数分别，并将其追加到集合。This implementation of the method creates the object using the name, type and value specified by the `name`, `type` and `value` parameters, respectively, and appends it to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何方法可用于添加新对象添加到通过提供集合`name`， `value`，并`type`参数。The following code example demonstrates how the method can be used to add new objects to a collection by supplying the `name`, `value`, and `type` parameters. 在此示例中，对象添加到提供的当前系统时间值的访问数据源控件的更新命令。In this example, a object is added to an Update command of an Access data source control that provides the value of the current system time. 将参数添加与的。The parameter is added with the of . remarks.format: ## Remarks `control`通过使用参数要检索的集合中包含的对象和当前对象对象绑定到。The `control` parameter is used by objects contained in the collection to retrieve the and current object that the object binds to. 因为对象必须具有唯一命名的项，但集合不要求或不保证唯一对象名称，此方法实现一个数字追加到每个最终属性若要确保返回的集合中的唯一性。Because the object must have uniquely named entries but the collection does not require or guarantee unique object names, the implementation of this method appends a number to the end of each property to ensure uniqueness in the returned collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此索引器获取按名称从对象集合，并使用数组表示法。Use this indexer to get a object by name from the collection, using array notation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法和要删除索引器对象从集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the indexer to remove a object from a collection. 在此示例中，多个对象添加到集合，一个从集合中移除，并在页面加载时输出集合的顺序。In this example, several objects are added to a collection, one is removed from the collection, and the order of the collection is printed when the page loads. summary.span: 在清除此集合内容之后执行其他自定义进程。

span.span: Performs additional custom processes after clearing the contents of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用以执行其他处理后的方法完成。The method is called to perform additional processing after the method completes. 它将调用方法。It calls the method.

span.para: 此方法允许实施者能定义必须从基础集合中删除所有元素后执行的过程。通过定义此方法，实现者可以向继承的方法添加功能，而无需重写所有其他方法。 标准之前调用行为，而后标准调用行为。

This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed after deleting all the elements from the underlying collection. By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods. is invoked before the standard behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定是否在指定的对象`o`参数是实例。The method determines whether the object specified in the `o` parameter is a instance. 如果不是，引发异常。If not, it throws an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler ParametersChanged;
.event class System.EventHandler ParametersChanged
Public Custom Event ParametersChanged As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ ParametersChanged;
member this.ParametersChanged : EventHandler

summary.span: 当集合包含的一个或多个 对象的状态改变时发生。

span.span: Occurs when one or more objects contained by the collection changes state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合包含由数据源控件，事件引发的数据源控件`DataSourceChanged`导致任何数据绑定控件重新绑定的事件。If the collection is contained by a data source control, the event raises the data source control's `DataSourceChanged` event, causing any data-bound controls to rebind. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: The to remove from the .

summary.span: 从 集合中移除指定的 对象。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法移除指定对象从集合。Use this method to remove the specified object from a collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法和要删除索引器对象从集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the indexer to remove a object from a collection. 在此示例中，多个对象添加到集合，一个从集合中删除对象，并在页面加载时输出集合的顺序。In this example, several objects are added to a collection, one object is removed from the collection, and the order of the collection is printed when the page loads. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6/CS/qsp6cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter_6/VB/qsp6vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `control`通过使用参数要检索的集合中包含的对象和当前对象对象绑定到。The `control` parameter is used by objects contained in the collection to retrieve the and current object that the object binds to. 如果当前值对象是不同的视图状态中缓存的值从调用方法。If the current value for the object is different from the value cached in view state, the method is called.
